channel.title: Pissed off
channel.description:
I just spent £40 on MAG and it has turned out to be the shittest FPs I have ever played. I dont give a shit if I am playing with 255 other people, the graphics are shit, the gameplay and controls are shit, the "teambased" war is shit, and the weapons are shit for 2025.
Iam so fucking annoyed I bought this game.
Anyone else feel my pain?

item.title: Pissed off
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Too bad. I’ve read that in order to play it properly you have to work as a squad. Seems like its bound to fail because half the time you can’t count on people in a game as most likely you’ll be stuck with a 5 year old who just learned how to turn on the Playstation.

Read full topic

item.title: Pissed off
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

played it when I was less drunk and when you rank up a couple of levels its pretty fun. Not great though…could of been much better…

Read full topic

item.title: Pissed off
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Return it NOW as a second hand game. You will obviously loose money but you will loose a lot of more if you act later.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Unlimited1 wrote:

Say it is broken and ask for store credit or something.
